privacy.title: Privacy & Local Storage
privacy.description: All your data is stored locally on your device. Nothing is sent to any server. The only way to share your projects is by exporting them as HTML or JSON files.

faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about Interactive HTML Gifts.
faq.startFreeSubtitle: No credit card required. Upgrade whenever you're ready.

questions.q: What is an interactive HTML gift?
questions.a: An interactive HTML gift is a self-contained HTML file that plays like a mini experience. It includes photos, music, text, animations, and interactive elements. No app or server needed ‚Äî just open the file in any browser.

questions.q: How do I send the HTML gift to someone?
questions.a: You can share it as a link, QR code, or send the HTML file directly via email, messaging apps, or any file-sharing method. The recipient just opens it in their browser ‚Äî no installation required.

questions.q: Is the Pro plan really one-time payment?
questions.a: Yes. Pay once and export unlimited watermark-free gifts forever.
You can create gifts for clients or sell the experiences you design.

questions.q: How many gifts can I create?
questions.a: Unlimited. Create as many as you like and export anytime.

questions.q: Can I upgrade from Free to Pro later?
questions.a: Absolutely. Start free and upgrade when you are ready with one click.
We offer a 14-day money-back guarantee for Pro and Team purchases.

questions.q: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.a: Major credit cards and popular wallets are supported for secure checkout.

questions.q: What image formats can I upload?
questions.a: We support JPG, PNG, and WebP formats. Images are automatically optimized for the best balance of quality and file size.
MP3 and WAV formats are supported. Audio files are embedded directly into the HTML file.

questions.q: Can I edit the gift after exporting?
questions.a: Yes, you can always come back to edit your project and export a new version.

questions.q: How many screens can I add?
questions.a: You can add as many screens as you need. Most templates come with 2-7 screens, but you can customize this.

questions.q: Can I use the editor on my phone?
questions.a: The editor works best on desktop and tablet devices. Mobile editing is coming soon.

about.body1: Interactive HTML Gifts was born from a simple belief: the most meaningful moments in life deserve more than a text message or a generic e-card. They deserve experiences that feel personal, that tell a story, that make people feel something.
about.body2: This is a tool built by an artist who learned to code ‚Äî not a tech company that forgot about the human side. Every design decision, every feature, every pixel is guided by one question: will this help someone express their love better?
about.cardBody: Every interaction, every animation, every detail is crafted to help you create something truly special.

contact.subtitle: Have a question, idea, or just want to say hello? We'd love to hear from you.
contact.reasonLabel: What do you want to create?
contact.messagePlaceholder: Tell us how we can help you...
contact.submitSuccess: Thank you for your message! We'll get back to you soon.

liveExamples.subtitle: Explore interactive gifts created by real people for real moments. Click any example to experience it yourself.
liveExamples.ctaTitle: Ready to create your own story?
liveExamples.ctaSubtitle: Your moments deserve to be remembered beautifully

birthdayMom.title: Birthday Surprise for Mom
birthdayMom.description: A heartfelt five-screen journey celebrating 60 years of an amazing life.
steps: A full-screen photo of mom with confetti falling and "Happy 60th Birthday!" appearing letter by letter.
A collage of childhood memories with gentle pan-and-zoom animations.
A voice note from the family layered over a slideshow.
A timeline of special moments with emojis for each milestone.
A final thank-you message with a heart animation and a "Replay" button.

loveStory.title: Our Love Story ‚Äî 10 Years Together
loveStory.description: A romantic seven-screen anniversary gift walking through a decade of love.
steps: Opening screen with "10 Years Together" and a photo montage of the couple.
The first date: where it all began, with photos and memories.
Milestone moments: moving in together, first vacation, engagement.
The wedding day: beautiful ceremony photos and vows.
Building a home: house, pets, and life together.
Adventures and travels: all the places they've explored together.
A heartfelt message with "Here's to forever" and a replay button.

weddingSaveDate.title: Save the Date ‚Äî Sarah & David
weddingSaveDate.description: An elegant four-screen wedding invitation that guests actually opened and remembered.
steps: Elegant opening with the couple's names and wedding date.
Venue details with a beautiful location photo and address.
Countdown timer showing days until the big day.
RSVP section with a link to confirm attendance.

welcomeBaby.title: Welcome Baby Mia
welcomeBaby.description: A three-screen announcement introducing the newest family member to the world.
steps: Adorable baby photo with name, birth date, and stats (weight, length).
Family introduction: photos of parents and siblings meeting the baby.
Thank you message with a call to visit and meet the new addition.

thankYouCoach.title: Thank You, Coach Mike
thankYouCoach.description: A two-screen gratitude message from the basketball team to their retiring coach.
steps: Team photo with a heartfelt message thanking Coach Mike for years of dedication.
Highlights reel of memorable moments and achievements, ending with "You'll always be our coach."

imSorry.title: I'm Sorry ‚Äî Please Forgive Me
imSorry.description: A three-screen sincere apology that helped mend a broken friendship.
steps: Opening with "I'm sorry" and acknowledging the mistake.
A personal message explaining what happened and taking responsibility.
A promise for the future and a request for forgiveness with a hopeful message.
